p: The results of scavenging potential of AG-ME on hydrogen peroxide are shown in Figure 2(a). As shown in the figure, a concentration-dependent (50-1000 μg/ml) strong hydrogen peroxide scavenging activity of AG-ME was observed. At the concentration of 500 μg/ml, the H 2O 2 scavenging activity of AG-ME was 78.65%; however, at the same concentration, ascorbic acid was 82.43%. The H 2O 2 scavenging activity of AG-ME closely resembled to the ascorbic acid. The IC 50 of AG-ME and ascorbic acid were 126.3 μg/ml and 100.5 μg/ml, respectively ( Table 1).
